article_title: Dual enrollment program offers college credit to Burke students - Morganton.com
article_text:

og.description: A group of hardworking juniors and seniors are Draughn High School are working toward graduation and earning free college credit at the same time — a dual enrollment partnership with Western Piedmont Community College that Burke County Public Schools hopes to expand in the future.
